pxchat.net.protocol.core
Class FrameAdapter

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.protocol.core.FrameAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthFrameAdapter
public class FrameAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the interface between a socket and the frame protocol. It handles incoming and outgoing data by calling the process event of the associated listener.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

Field Summary
private  boolean doDisconnect
          Disconnects the socket after processing the incoming queue.
protected  FrameQueue incoming
          The incoming frames which were received by the socket.
private  FrameAdapterListener listener
          A listener for the callbacks of this adapter.
protected  FrameQueue outgoing
          The outgoing frames, which will be send be the socket.
protected  int sessionID
          A unique id used to identify this adapter, or more generally, the associated socket.
protected  CustomSocket socket
          The socket associated with this adapter.
 
Constructor Summary
FrameAdapter(CustomSocket socket, FrameAdapterListener listener)
          Constructs a new frame adapter associated with the socket and the listener.

FrameAdapter

public FrameAdapter(CustomSocket socket,
                    FrameAdapterListener listener)
Constructs a new frame adapter associated with the socket and the listener.

Method Detail

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Disconnects the socket after having processed the received data.

Returns the incoming frame queue of this adapter.

Returns:

getSocket

public CustomSocket getSocket()
Returns the socket associated with this adapter

Returns:
The socket of this adapter

receive

public void receive(java.lang.Object object)
Receives data from the socket and processes it by calling the process event of the listener. This method does not wait for incoming data, it has to be passed in object.

Parameters:
object - The incoming data

reset

public void reset()
Resets the adapter by clearing the incoming and outgoing frame queues. This method should be called before the client connects.

send

public boolean send()
Sends the outgoing frame queue.

Returns:
true if successful, false else

send

protected boolean send(FrameQueue queue)
Immediately sends the specified frame queue.

Parameters:
queue - The frame queue to send
Returns:
true if successful, false else

setListener

public void setListener(FrameAdapterListener listener)
Sets the listener of this adapter.

Parameters:
listener - The new listener

setSessionID

public void setSessionID(int sessionID)
Sets the session id of this adapter. This should only be called once after having received the session id from the server.

Parameters:
sessionID - The session id to set
